item.description:
We'll be meeting in the same Scarborough location to watch part of a movie to stimulate our conversation.  Also re-set our intentions and see how everyone's summer is going!

 

Look forward to seeing everyone and as usual they'll be a slight donation to off set costs.  See you soon... Caryn
item.how_to_find_us: We're in Scarborough and I'll send an e-mail when you sign up.
item.name: Let's re-evaluate where we are and set some more intentions!
